page.title: 05EIGHT ACRES HOTEL
page.content: Eight Acres Hotel is a 58 bed-roomed, 3-star hotel situated in a commodious and beautifully landscaped site on the north side of the A96 on the western outskirts of Elgin. All bedrooms are with full services. Public rooms of varying sizes offer accommodation for parties, meetings or conferences of 20 to 280. The Sports Complex was completed in 1984. It is run by the hotel as a wholly-owned member's club. Hotel guests have full use of all facilities. The complex consists of a 15m heated swimming pool, with access in fine weather to an outside lounging area. There is a 6-place jacuzzi. Sunbeds, solaria and sauna are located in both male and female changing rooms. There are 3 squash courts, pool and table tennis. The gymnasium offers multi-gym equipment, cycle and rowing machines.
